marklogic.body: "Up to three more Burns could take place this season before May 11." Â Whoopee! Â Glad they wait until the birds are nesting and wildlife babies have been born and/or hatched. Probably nesting will happen sooner this year because of the warm March. Â Does anyone know why the controlled Burns can't be done in winter? Â There was no snow cover this past winter and it was relatively dry. Â Read more here: http://www.centredaily.com/2012/03/30/3145343/scotia-barren-Burns-planned-for.html#storylink=omni_popular%23wgt=pop#storylink=cpy Â Â
